facultyName: Faculty of Arts and Creative Industries
description: Imaginative, original and full of ideas, Creative Technology combines technical and creative skills to create the technologies of the future. At Middlesex, you'll have the opportunity to learn through doing, experimenting with different types of technology to design and build your own inventions.
fees: FeesUK students MA Full-time students: £10,500 Part-time students: £77  MSc Full-time students: £10,500 Part-time students: £70 per credit Part-time students: £35 per dissertation credit
